mobiles.name: sym jester
mobiles.long_description: A lithe jester frolicks in the shadows.
mobiles.description:
A cartwheeling flurry slows momentarily to resolve itself into a slim,
green-clad figure crowned by a tassled jester's hat.  Stitched in gold
across the right and left breast pockets you notice the words:
"Sym"
and
"To wonder is to grow"
The left pocket is partially tinted with grass stains.

mobiles.name: roc bird
mobiles.long_description: A huge grey-winged bird eyes you hungrily.
mobiles.description:
An enormous white bird with white-streaked grey wings towers above you,
peering down at you as if examining a possible meal.  Of course, from that
height, you probably do resemble a bug..  yumm...

mobiles.name: nightingale bird
mobiles.long_description: A little black nightingale hops around, pecking at seed pods.
mobiles.description:
Light glints off the shiny black feathers of the tiny dark nightingale.
The little bird cocks its head and returns your gaze, then chirps musically
and returns to its lunch.

mobiles.name: teacher woman statue
mobiles.long_description: A statue of a tall woman stands on the white pedestal, bending over the book.
mobiles.description:
A stone statue of a tall woman garbed in flowing grey robes is poised with
one hand above the book, pointing as if to emphasize one paragraph.

mobiles.name: student girl statue
mobiles.long_description: A statue of a young girl stands half on the grey pedestal.
mobiles.description:
A white marble statue of a young girl stands next to the book, one foot on
grey pedestal.  Her attention seems half focused on the book, half gazing at
the teacher.  The stone eyes seem bright and curious, yet shadowed.  A
puzzled frown mars the otherwise smooth young face.

mobiles.name: mage statue figure man
mobiles.long_description: A stone statue of a robed figure stands here, arms raised as if casting.
mobiles.description:
Grey-streaked white marble has been carved into the form of a short man
draped with long, flowing robes.  His arms are raised before him, and the 
stone mouth is open, as if frozen in the middle of an incantation.

mobiles.name: unicorn white horse
mobiles.long_description: A white horse with a glowing blue horn regards you serenely.
mobiles.description:
A single blue horn emerges from the white forehead, glowing with an
eerie inner light.  The clear eyes seem timelessly wise, yet shadowed
with a strange, innocent vacancy.

mobiles.name: white statue dreamer
mobiles.long_description: A marble statue of the Dreamer stands here.
mobiles.description:
A female figure of indeterminate age has been sculpted from white marble.
The chiseled face is upturned, the stone eyes gazing at nothing, as if lost
in either the past or the future.  The statue gleams in the light, untouched
by time or weather.  But then, it doesn't look like the Dreamer will ever
belong to the present.

mobiles.name: white knight figure
mobiles.long_description: An imposing figure in gleaming white armor stands here.
mobiles.description:
A knight clad in shining white armor towers above like some hulking steel
giant.  Light reflects off the burnished metal, surrounding the knight with
a near blinding aurora.  Emblazoned in the center of the chest plate is a
gleaming cross... white, of course.

mobiles.name: ivory statue lady justice
mobiles.long_description: An ivory statue of a lady is poised here, balancing a set of iron scales.
mobiles.description:
A fair lady of indeterminate age has been sculpted of ivory.  One hand 
extends before her, holding a set of ivory scales.  The ivory seems to have
chipped on one side, causing the scales to tilt slightly.

mobiles.name: mad gardener gnome
mobiles.long_description: A little gnome capers around, waving a set of pruning shears.
mobiles.description:
The little gnome appears to be a gardener.. that is, he dances around snipping
at things with no apparent plan or reason..  Surprisingly, the garden looks
well cared for, although those shears he's waving around look sort of lethal 
to anything living that might get in the way..

mobiles.name: babbling sculptor
mobiles.long_description: A short, disheveled man is here, muttering to himself.
mobiles.description:
Oblivious to your scrutiny, the little man continues to pace about, babbling
incoherently.  Judging from the chisel marks on the walls, he seems to
be the creator of this artwork..

mobiles.name: bush denebi priest white cross
mobiles.long_description: A bush has been pruned in the form of a kneeling priest.
mobiles.description:
A white cross, seeming to glow with a light of its own, is emblazoned across
the front of the priest's robes.  Both arms are raised in front of the figure,
as if in prayer.

mobiles.name: statue believer
mobiles.long_description: A statue of the Believer stands here, eyes raised to the sky.
mobiles.description:
Funny.. when you try to look where the Believer is gazing so faithfully, all 
you see is thin air.

mobiles.name: white rabbit
mobiles.long_description: A fluffy white rabbit crouches here, nibbling on something.
mobiles.description: Aww, isn't it cute?

mobiles.name: druid peace bush man
mobiles.long_description: A bush pruned into the form of a tall man dressed in simple robes is here.
mobiles.description:
He seems at peace with himself and the world around him.  This form is
evidently in need of pruning, as uncut leaves protrude from the area where
his mouth would be, making him the appear to be sticking his tongue out
at you.

mobiles.name: crying spirit translucent figure
mobiles.long_description: A translucent figure hovers here, crying bitterly.
mobiles.description:
It seems to be the spirit of a young girl, bound to this world by an 
untimely death.  Oblivious to your presence, she hovers here rocking and
weeping quietly.  You can make out a few whispered words.. 
".. been different... couldn't.. i had to..."

mobiles.name: faith
mobiles.long_description: A bit of faith floats here, thriving on your belief in its existence.
mobiles.description: It seems to grow more solid as you look at it.

mobiles.name: stray thought
mobiles.long_description: A stray thought floats around aimlessly.
mobiles.description: Weird.  You can see right through it.

mobiles.name: memories
mobiles.long_description: Some memories hover here, reminiscing.
mobiles.description: They remind you of something.. but you can't quite recall what..

mobiles.name: idea
mobiles.long_description: An idea pops in and out of view.
mobiles.description: You are blinded by a flash of insight!

mobiles.name: white panther gabrian
mobiles.long_description: A huge white panther pads silently across the room.
mobiles.description:
Despite the silence of its movements, powerful muscles controlled by a smooth
feline grace betray the danger beneath the quiet.  Slitted silver eyes seem
to watch your every move.

mobiles.name: lonari white lady
mobiles.long_description: A beautiful lady clad in spotless white is here, smiling serenely.
mobiles.description:
Cascades of shimmering golden hair frame a fine boned elfin face and clear
blue eyes.  The pale blue irises seem almost white.. as if blind.  Yet the
lady can clearly see.. though what she is looking at is not visible to you.

mobiles.name: myrl figure cynic
mobiles.long_description: A grinning figure wrapped all in black watches you with amusement.
mobiles.description:
Clothed in a darkness not entirely physical, this character seems like
an extension of the surrounding shadows.  White teeth flash momentarily
against the black in a cynical grin.  Tattooed along the left and right
arms are the words:
"In this world built of lies
 believe in nothing
 and trust in no one"
and
"Myrl"

mobiles.name: hellhawk hawk
mobiles.long_description: A giant, black-winged hawk perches here.
mobiles.description:
Fiery green eyes glow against the dark avian face with a bottomless hunger
that makes you shiver inside.

mobiles.name: silent stalker figure
mobiles.long_description: A silent black-clothed figure blends in with the shadows.
mobiles.description:
The dark figure moves in and out of the shadows with the graceful power of
a cat.

mobiles.name: twisted being
mobiles.long_description: A twisted being stalks about looking for souls to corrupt.
mobiles.description:
A horrorific construction of bones and flesh shambles around the room.  The
dull grey eyes flash restlessly from side to side searchingly.

mobiles.name: screaming soul
mobiles.long_description: A tortured soul writhes here, screaming in agony.
mobiles.description:
Flesh has been stripped off the body in long chunks, revealing bloody white
bones beneath.  As the soul writhes with pain, larger chunks peel off and
fall to the floor.

mobiles.name: dark necromancer cowled figure
mobiles.long_description: A tall, cowled figure stands here, radiating an aura of power.
mobiles.description:
Fierce red eyes flash eerily from within the dark cowl.  One arm raises, and
you notice that the fingers are clawed and bloody..

mobiles.name: nightmare black horse darkness
mobiles.long_description: The darkness writhes and coallesces into the form of a pitch black horse.
mobiles.description:
A tall, fierce horse with blood red eyes stands before you, seeming to twist
in and out of being even as you look at it.  All light is repelled from the
vicinity of the beast, surrounding it with an aura of blackness, pierced
only by the hellish red lights of its eyes.

mobiles.name: anti-bishop bishop woman
mobiles.long_description: A tall woman in bloodied black robes prepares to make a sacrifice.
mobiles.description:
Long black robes, stained with blood both old and new, outline the figure of
a beautiful woman.  However, as the woman raises her head, the thin lips 
part in a ghastly parody of a smile, twisting her face into something
terribly evil and entirely inhuman.

mobiles.name: wraith knight humanoid form
mobiles.long_description: A ghastly humanoid form floats here, reeking of death.
mobiles.description:
An aura of evil and death hangs about the dark wraith.  It turns its head, 
and the blood red eyes seem to bore into yours with an insatiable hunger..

mobiles.name: bloody sadist
mobiles.long_description: A bloody sadist searches madly for someone to torture.
mobiles.description:
Though the form is human enough, disheveled black hair and bloody, taloned
hands give the figure a ghastly, inhuman appearance.  The wild dark eyes
flicker searchingly around the room.

mobiles.name: fanatic cultist
mobiles.long_description: A cultist is here, cleaning the walls.
mobiles.description:
A black-robed cultist is attempting to keep the onyx walls spotless.  He's 
doing a remarkable good job, considering that his tongue is only so long..

mobiles.name: grinner
mobiles.long_description: A huge grin floats here.. grinning.
mobiles.description:
A set of gleaming white teeth hover in midair, fixed in a wide grin bordering
on insane.  Then again.. floating teeth?  Maybe you're not entirely all there
yourself...  <g>

mobiles.name: cultist high priest
mobiles.long_description: A cold humanoid form stands here, radiating evil and decay.
mobiles.description:
A cruel smile twists the dark human face into something hellish and cold.
Powerful taloned hands grasp a sacrificial dagger still grimy with blood.
The ghastly face turns towards you and licks its lips.

mobiles.name: nothingness square area
mobiles.long_description: All matter has disappeared in a square area in the center of the room.
mobiles.description: Your guts wrench as you attempt to look at.. nothing at all.

mobiles.name: furry lemming
mobiles.long_description: A cute little lemming is here, trying to kill itself.
mobiles.description:
This furry little creature would be pretty cute if it didn't seem so bent
on self destruction.

mobiles.name: warlord man
mobiles.long_description: A huge muscular man glowers at you.
mobiles.description:
Wary, intelligent eyes combine with honed muscles and reflexive grace to
make this man a very dangerous enemy.

mobiles.name: vampire janitor white fangs
mobiles.long_description: White fangs gleam in the darkness as a scream of insane rage shatters the air!
mobiles.description:
It could almost be a part of the shadows, if it weren't for the telltale
red eyes gleaming sadistically against the blackness.

mobiles.name: lost dreams
mobiles.long_description: Some dreams drift aimlessly.
mobiles.description: Some dreams have been left here, forgotten.

mobiles.name: tainted knowledge
mobiles.long_description: A bit of knowledge, tattered and grey, floats in midair.
mobiles.description: You feel wiser, yet somehow dirty..

mobiles.name: forgotten lies
mobiles.long_description: Some lies have been hidden here.
mobiles.description: As you attempt to look at them, they bury deeper into the shadows.

mobiles.name: lost hopes
mobiles.long_description: Some hopes have been left here to drift.
mobiles.description: An overwhelming feeling of hopelessness washes over you.

mobiles.name: black panther daemias
mobiles.long_description: A black panther stalks restlessly through the shadows.
mobiles.description:
Slitted silver eyes gleam warily from the powerful cat form as she prowls
silently, like a living shadow.

mobiles.name: dierek black man
mobiles.long_description: A darkly handsome man stands here, radiating evil.
mobiles.description:
Raven black hair frames handsome, chiseled features and a powerful human
build.  The dark silver eyes, shadowed with pain, are strangely at odds with
the cruel smile that seems to have permanently twisted the human lips.

mobiles.name: shadow reality
mobiles.long_description: A shadow of reality has been stuffed into a corner.
mobiles.description: It leers at you mockingly.

mobiles.name: terrified victim
mobiles.long_description: A sacrifice victim lies here, too terrified to scream.
mobiles.description: This person is completely rigid with fear.

mobiles.name: sub gardener gnome
mobiles.long_description: A little gnome whistles merrily as he prunes.
mobiles.description: He appears to be taking good care of the garden.

mobiles.name: ghostly servant transparent form
mobiles.long_description: A transparent form floats here, cleaning up.
mobiles.description:
Strange, you can see right through it..  It appears to be keeping the area
clean.

mobiles.name: ykres silent figure
mobiles.long_description: A silent figure melts into the shadows.
mobiles.description: Wary green eyes glow like a cat's amidst the deep shadow.

mobiles.name: assassin
mobiles.long_description: An assassin stalks in the shadows, looking for prey.
mobiles.description: The dark eyes seem to measure you, searching for weakness.

mobiles.name: night lynx cat form
mobiles.long_description: A huge, dark cat form prowls in the darkness.
mobiles.description: Slitted silver eyes glint menacingly.

mobiles.name: figment imagination dark shape
mobiles.long_description: A dark shape seems to flit through the trees in the corner of your eye.
mobiles.description: You think you see something there.. but maybe it's just your imagination.

mobiles.name: dark black owl
mobiles.long_description: A huge black owl roosts here.
mobiles.description:
Beneath the glimmering ice blue eyes, a cruel beak pokes out of the shadow
black feathers forming the avian face.

mobiles.name: owl hatchling
mobiles.long_description: An owl hatchling hops about clumsily.
mobiles.description:
Dark grey down covers a large owl shape and semiformed wings.  Long, cruel
black talons betray a natural predator behind the seeming vulnerability.

mobiles.name: nightling gaunt shape
mobiles.long_description: A gaunt shape hovers here.
mobiles.description:
Dark eyes glower hungrily from a translucent wraith form.  Long claws 
extend before the form.  You notice a piece of rotting flesh dangling
from one claw.

mobiles.name: sillouhette
mobiles.long_description: A sillouhette floats here.
mobiles.description: A dark sillouhette of a humanoid form.

mobiles.name: nightblade night blade dark elf drow
mobiles.long_description: A dark elf waits silently in the darkness.
mobiles.description: The slim form seems almost a part of the surrounding darkness.

mobiles.name: shadowblade shadow blade sinister form
mobiles.long_description: A lithe sinister form slips through the shadows.
mobiles.description: The figure seems to move constantly, eluding your focus.

mobiles.name: grey ninja cloaked form
mobiles.long_description: Wary green eyes glint menacingly from the hood of a grey cloaked form.
mobiles.description: The grey figure seems to blend in with its surroundings.

mobiles.name: black ninja figure
mobiles.long_description: A black clothed figure watches from the shadows.
mobiles.description:
Raven black hair frames a dark elven face and the slitted yellow eyes of a
cat.

mobiles.name: white ninja figure
mobiles.long_description: A figure clothed in white stands here.
mobiles.description: He seems to blur and shimmer like a living flame.

mobiles.name: shadow serpent
mobiles.long_description: A huge, powerful serpent coils here, preparing to strike.
mobiles.description:
Dark green scales gleam in the dim light.  A long forked tongue snakes
out from between sharp white fangs as the serpent hisses warningly.

mobiles.name: yllias silver eyes
mobiles.long_description: Slitted silver eyes glint from the shadows.
mobiles.description: The silver eyes gleam menacingly, like twin daggers in the darkness.

mobiles.name: reykas raven black wings
mobiles.long_description: Raven black wings gleam darkly.
mobiles.description:
Peering into the shadows, you can barely make out the looming form of a
dark hawk.

mobiles.name: menx jester
mobiles.long_description: A jester balances on one hand, giggling.
mobiles.description:
The little gnome bounces energetically around the room, giggling madly the
entire time.  You wonder momentarily whether he's completely insane or 
incredibly hyper..

mobiles.name: boggled brain
mobiles.long_description: A brain boggles along.
mobiles.description: It appears to be a bodiless brain, boggling..

mobiles.name: flying pig winged
mobiles.long_description: A large winged pig flutters here.
mobiles.description: It snuffles your armpit.

mobiles.name: mooo cow
mobiles.long_description: A mooo cow stands here, munching on an effigy of barney.
mobiles.description: Muh-oOoOOoo..

mobiles.name: stress
mobiles.long_description: Stress is here, trying to drive you up the wall.
mobiles.description: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARGGGGGGHHHHHHH!!!

mobiles.name: insanity
mobiles.long_description: Someone's twisted idea of insanity is here, bouncing off the walls.
mobiles.description: It giggles and bonks you on the head.

mobiles.name: fool
mobiles.long_description: A fool is here, searching for a brain.
mobiles.description:
He looks completely and utterly clueless.  Why not give him a hand?  Or
better yet, a brain?

mobiles.name: psychiatrist woman
mobiles.long_description: A woman in a white coat is here, trying to analyze you.
mobiles.description: She peers down her nose at you and mumbles something about ids and egos.

mobiles.name: normal person
mobiles.long_description: A normal person stands here, looking boring.
mobiles.description: It's a normal person, with neat blond hair and a trendy suit.  How boring..

mobiles.name: toilet monster mound stuff
mobiles.long_description: A smelly mound of... stuff... squishes here.
mobiles.description: Gross..

mobiles.name: mole
mobiles.long_description: A mole is here, tunneling.
mobiles.description:
It's a furry brown mole.  Beady black eyes glance at you as sharp claws tunnel
into the dirt at a tremendous pace.

mobiles.name: xyrist multicolored light colored
mobiles.long_description: Multicolored light coallesces here.
mobiles.description:
The swirling light continuously forms and reforms.  At the moment, it
resembles a giant rabbit.

mobiles.name: fax parrot
mobiles.long_description: A bright red parrot perches here, mimicking your movements.
mobiles.description: He looks back at you.  You boggle, he boggles.  Argh..

mobiles.name: aerial servant
mobiles.long_description: An aerial servant hovers here.
mobiles.description:
Summoned from the elemental plane of air, the servant is bound to
follow its master's orders until it is killed or freed.

mobiles.name: flying fist
mobiles.long_description: A gauntleted fist hovers menacingly.
mobiles.description: Hard adamantite knuckles gleam with a fierce power.

mobiles.name: shadowcat shadow cat form
mobiles.long_description: A powerful cat form stalks in the shadows.
mobiles.description:
Midnight black hair ripples across the sleek muscles of a large,
powerful cat.

mobiles.name: silver lynx
mobiles.long_description: A silver lynx prowls here.
mobiles.description:
The huge silver cat form moves with a liquid grace that leaves the
impression of a living bolt of pure lightning.

mobiles.name: pegasus winged horse
mobiles.long_description: A winged horse hovers here.
mobiles.description:
Powerful snow white wings sprout from the equinne shoulder blades.
Intelligent sea blue eyes seem to follow your every move.

mobiles.name: firecat fire cat flaming
mobiles.long_description: Heat shimmers about a large, flaming cat.
mobiles.description:
Pure flame has been shaped into the form of a large cat.  Blue eyes
glint like twin furnaces amidst the heat.

mobiles.name: icecat ice cat crystalline form
mobiles.long_description: A huge, crystalline cat form stalks here.
mobiles.description:
Light glints off the crystalline form of a large, fierce cat.  Despite the
hardness of its make the cat moves with the silent, dangerous grace of
a killer.

mobiles.name: ethereal panther shimmering
mobiles.long_description: A shimmering panther prowls restlessly about the room.
mobiles.description:
A denizen of the ethereal plane, the panther appears almost unreal
here.  However, it moves with a silent, powerful grace which belies
the ability to do quite a bit of very real damage to those who oppose
its master..

mobiles.name: tenarezzii demon dark
mobiles.long_description: A dark demon glowers at you hatefully.
mobiles.description:
Narrow red eyes like living coals burn within a thin, snouted visage
similar to that of a dog.  Tough leathery skin covers long, muscular
arms and powerful legs.  A narrow enchanted collar encircles the thick
neck, binding it to the will of its master.

mobiles.name: devouk demon winged
mobiles.long_description: A winged demon hovers menacingly.
mobiles.description:
Fiery red skin stretches over lean, spindly muscles and broad, membranous
bat wings.  A thick tail protrudes from the demon's hindquarters, ending
in a sharp, triangular tip.

mobiles.name: chrezanni demon
mobiles.long_description: A huge, multi-armed demon towers over you.
mobiles.description:
Powerful muscles ripple beneath coarse, midnight black skin which seems
to absorb all light in the area.  Two muscular arms sprout from
either side of the broad torso, ending in wickedly sharp black talons.

mobiles.name: rabid hamster
mobiles.long_description: A deadly looking hamster is here.
mobiles.description:
The soft brown fur stands on end, giving the hamster the appearance
of a small and deadly fluffball.  Watch those incisors!

mobiles.name: rabid guinea pig
mobiles.long_description: A small guinea pig hisses at you viciously.
mobiles.description: It snuffles viciously.  Fatal and furry!

mobiles.name: dzenian blade
mobiles.long_description: A honed magical blade hovers here.
mobiles.description:
Exquisitely crafted of mithril, the blade has been given life through
powerful magic.  It is very precise and extremely deadly.

mobiles.name: ethereal weebie rodent
mobiles.long_description: A small, ethereal rodent shimmers here.
mobiles.description:
The rodent is formed of what appears to be multicolored light and
resembles a large rabbit.  Though small, it possesses an intelligence
and training which make it an deadly fighter.

mobiles.name: zkare blade
mobiles.long_description: A gleaming adamantite blade hovers here.
mobiles.description:
Powerful runes shimmer along both faces of the finely crafted adamantite
blade.  Magically empowered and honed, the blade is a lethal enemy.

mobiles.name: sherayna golden lady zeinia representative
mobiles.long_description:
A smiling golden haired lady looks up and says,
"Welcome to Zeinia International!  How may I help you?"
mobiles.description:
She has long golden hair and pixie-like features.
A classy nametag pinned to her lapel reads:

               "Sherayna"

mobiles.name: nyvri lady zeinia representative
mobiles.long_description: A classily dressed lady watches you, smiling.
mobiles.description:
She wears a dark pantsuit of expensive design.
A silver pin on her lapel reads:

             "Nyvri"

mobiles.name: zdreni avenger figure
mobiles.long_description: A darkly clad figure watches you, a cruel smile playing across its lips.
mobiles.description:
A slender dark elven form stands before you, eyes glimmering with a
strange, cruel light which seems to glow in the darkness like twin flames.
The avenger is among the best in blade, stealth, and magic of the clan
and is sworn to destroy all who spill the blood of a Zdreni clan member.
Deemed to be beyond the rank structure and fierce competition among
the clan members for status, the avenger is extremely loyal to all members
of the clan.  Shimmering above the collarbone is the form of a stooping
hawk over two crossed daggers.

mobiles.name: zdreni avenger assassin figure
mobiles.long_description: A darkly clad figure watches you, a cruel smile playing across its lips.
mobiles.description:
A slender dark elven form stands before you, eyes glimmering with a
strange, cruel light which seems to glow in the darkness like twin flames.
The avenger is among the best in blade, stealth, and magic of the clan
and is sworn to destroy all who spill the blood of a Zdreni clan member.
Considered beyond the rank structure and fierce competition among
the clan members for status, the avenger is extremely loyal to all members
of the clan.  Shimmering above the collarbone is the form of a stooping
hawk over two crossed daggers.

mobiles.name: zdreni deathmaster assassin
mobiles.long_description: A dangerous assassin clad entirely in black watches you measuringly.
mobiles.description:
Icy silver eyes seem to measure you with a glance.  The deathmaster
is the leader of the Zdreni guild and extremely powerful, both because
of the influence of his position and his ability to retain it despite
the power games of those below him.  The image of two crossed daggers
shimmers above his collarbone.

mobiles.name: zdreni shadowmaster assassin dark elven form
mobiles.long_description: A slender dark elven form blends in with the shadows.
mobiles.description:
The figure moves with a powerful liquid grace, like a living shadow.
Silent and deadly, the shadowmaster is a lethal enemy.

mobiles.name: zdreni blademaster assassin
mobiles.long_description: An assassin stalks here with deadly grace.
mobiles.description:
The blademaster has been honed mind and body to the sharpness of
a living weapon.  Crisscrossed scars mar the dark skin, tokens
of the power and difficulty of this rank.

mobiles.name: zdreni magemaster assassin elf form
mobiles.long_description: A silent dark elven form emerges from the shadows.
mobiles.description:
In addition to skills in weapons and stealth, the magemaster excels
in the magical arts.  The combination makes the magemaster an extremely
versatile and effective assassin.

mobiles.name: zdreni stalker assassin figure
mobiles.long_description: A silent figure stalks in the shadows.
mobiles.description:
A middle rank assassin, the stalker has trained extensively in the
arts of death.  Increase in status up to this level has been obtained
by consent of the deathmaster, as the assassination of other clan
members while below this rank is cause for immediate death.  Rise in
rank for the stalker from now on will come only through the assassination
of one of higher rank.  Hence, the stalker seeks to hone his abilities
to perfection, for a failed assassination attempt means instant death,
and those above him are anything but strangers to the art.

mobiles.name: zdreni darkblade assassin form
mobiles.long_description: A dark form measures you from the shadows.
mobiles.description:
The darkblade is an expert in killing and has already caused numerous
deaths to obtain this rank.

mobiles.name: zdreni venomblade assassin elf
mobiles.long_description: A dark elf looks you over and smiles cruelly.
mobiles.description:
Well versed in the arts of killing, the venomblade also has an extensive
repertoire of poisons to aid his assassinations.

mobiles.name: zdreni stiletto assassin
mobiles.long_description: An assassin appears silently from the darkness.
mobiles.description:
The stiletto assassin moves with the quiet, lethal grace of a well-aimed
blade.

mobiles.name: zdreni apprentice assassin young
mobiles.long_description: A young assassin is here, toying with a dagger.
mobiles.description:
The apprentice assassin, having completed the guild's deadly entrance
trials, is among the lowest in rank.  Though not as finely honed
as those above him, the apprentice has already begun to learn his
art and is a dangerous enemy.

mobiles.name: applicant young drow
mobiles.long_description: A young drow is here, awaiting the entrance trials.
mobiles.description:
This drow has applied for entrance to the guild and awaits the trials
which will prove his worth to join the guild.  Failure will mean
immediate death.  And cowardice at this point will bring down the wrath
of the guild, also resulting in death.

mobiles.name: shadow panther black
mobiles.long_description: A huge black panther flickers in and out of the shadows.
mobiles.description:
Intelligent green eyes glow eerily from the midnight black mask of
the huge cat.  Though large, the panther is all muscle and moves
with a powerful grace.

mobiles.name: guardian lynx black
mobiles.long_description: A midnight black lynx paces silently.
mobiles.description: Slitted green eyes watch you warily.  A black key is draped around its neck.

mobiles.name: zdreni magemaster assassin
mobiles.long_description: A Zdreni magemaster is here, training apprentices.
mobiles.description:
Of the three magemaster, this is the one currently assigned to
teach apprentices in the arts of killing magics.

mobiles.name: zdreni apprentice assassin
mobiles.long_description: An apprentice assassin is here, studying magic.
mobiles.description:
The apprentice assassin, having completed the guild's deadly entrance
trials, is among the lowest in rank.  Though not as finely honed
as those above him, the apprentice has already begun to learn his
art and is a dangerous enemy.

mobiles.name: zdreni apprentice assassin
mobiles.long_description: An apprentice assassin is practicing spellcasting.
mobiles.description:
The apprentice assassin, having completed the guild's deadly entrance
trials, is among the lowest in rank.  Though not as finely honed
as those above him, the apprentice has already begun to learn his
art and is a dangerous enemy.

mobiles.name: zdreni blademaster assassin
mobiles.long_description: A blademaster is here, training students.
mobiles.description:
The blademaster has been honed mind and body to the sharpness of
a living weapon.  Crisscrossed scars mar the dark skin, tokens
of the power and difficulty of this rank.

mobiles.name: zdreni apprentice assassin
mobiles.long_description: An apprentice assassin is here, training in weapons skills.
mobiles.description:
The apprentice assassin, having completed the guild's deadly entrance
trials, is among the lowest in rank.  Though not as finely honed
as those above him, the apprentice has already begun to learn his
art and is a dangerous enemy.

mobiles.name: zdreni apprentice assassin
mobiles.long_description: An apprentice assassin is here, practicing.
mobiles.description:
The apprentice assassin, having completed the guild's deadly entrance
trials, is among the lowest in rank.  Though not as finely honed
as those above him, the apprentice has already begun to learn his
art and is a dangerous enemy.

mobiles.name: zdreni magemaster assassin
mobiles.long_description: A Zdreni magemaster is here, concentrating on an experiment.
mobiles.description:
Of the three magemaster, this is the one currently assigned to
teach apprentices in the arts of killing magics.

mobiles.name: zdreni venomblade assassin elf
mobiles.long_description: A venomblade is here, assisting his magemaster.
mobiles.description:
Well versed in the arts of killing, the venomblade also has an extensive
repertoire of poisons to aid his assassinations.

mobiles.name: zdreni stiletto assassin
mobiles.long_description: A stiletto assassin is here, assisting her magemaster.
mobiles.description:
The stiletto assassin moves with the quiet, lethal grace of a well-aimed
blade.

mobiles.name: zdreni venomblade assassin elf
mobiles.long_description: A venomblade is mixing chemicals here.
mobiles.description:
Well versed in the arts of killing, the venomblade also has an extensive
repertoire of poisons to aid his assassinations.

mobiles.name: zdreni venomblade assassin elf
mobiles.long_description: A venomblade is here, testing some new poisons on captives.
mobiles.description:
White teeth gleam as the assassin smiles cruelly and forces the poison
into the captives' mouths.

mobiles.name: screaming captive
mobiles.long_description: A captive is here, screaming and struggling against the restraints.
mobiles.description:
The captive tugs futiley at the cords which bind him to the table
and only succeeds in pulling them tighter.

mobiles.name: zdreni drow armoursmith smith
mobiles.long_description: A drow stands here, hammering.
mobiles.description:
Taught muscles bulge against the dark elven skin as the armoursmith
strikes the metal before him.

mobiles.name: zdreni drow weaponsmith smith
mobiles.long_description: A drow is here, working at the forge.
mobiles.description:
Sparks fly as the weaponsmith hammers the red hot metal on the anvil
before him into the shape of a dagger.

mobiles.name: zdreni avenger leader figure
mobiles.long_description: A darkly clad figure watches you, a cruel smile playing across its lips.
mobiles.description:
A slender dark elven form stands before you, eyes glimmering with a
strange, cruel light which seems to glow in the darkness like twin flames.
The avenger is among the best in blade, stealth, and magic of the clan
and is sworn to destroy all who spill the blood of a Zdreni clan member.
Deemed to be beyond the rank structure and fierce competition among
the clan members for status, the avenger is extremely loyal to all members
of the clan.  Shimmering above the collarbone is the form of a stooping
hawk over two crossed daggers.

mobiles.name: zdreni stalker assassin figure
mobiles.long_description: A silent figure stalks in the shadows.
mobiles.description:
A middle rank assassin, the stalker has trained extensively in the
arts of death.  Increase in status up to this level has been obtained
by consent of the deathmaster, as the assassination of other clan
members while below this rank is cause for immediate death.  Rise in
rank for the stalker from now on will come only through the assassination
of one of higher rank.  Hence, the stalker seeks to hone his abilities
to perfection, for a failed assassination attempt means instant death,
and those above him are anything but strangers to the art.

objects.name: artwork white object bones thing
objects.description: A twisting white object casts strange shadows across the clearing.

extra_descriptions.description:
A ghastly array of bones, bent in impossible angles and melded together, form
a huge domelike structure.  The bones are polished to a sick white gleam and 
seem to twist and change even as you look at them.  A large gap is visible in 
the western face of the object, shifting occasionally with the movement of 
the bones.

objects.name: mirror pool water
objects.description: A circular pool of clear water shimmers here.

extra_descriptions.description:
Water, remarkably clear despite the muddy rivulets which feed it, forms a 
flat circular pool in the center of the cavern.  As you gaze at the pool,
you reflection seems to twist and darken.  Grinning, it beckons, and you feel 
drawn towards the pool.  The pool ripples and clears, and your reflection 
returns to normal.  Or did it ever really change.. ?

objects.name: shadow shadows
objects.description: The shadows seem to writhe along the cave wall, as if alive.

extra_descriptions.description: The shadows seem to beckon..

objects.name: leering stone face mouth
objects.short_description: the mouth of the leering face
objects.description: A grotesque stone face rests here, leering at you.

extra_descriptions.description:
The face has been carved twisted and waving, as if reflected in a bent
mirror.  The open mouth reveals a gaping, toothless void.  The stone tongue
hangs slightly out of the mouth like a ramp.

objects.name: dark pool water
objects.description: A pool of water has formed in the dark stone of the cave floor.

extra_descriptions.description:
Streamers of light flicker within the still, dark waters.  As you watch, 
they appear to wrap around your reflection, dissolving it for a moment
into glitters of light.  Something about the pool is both frightening
and appealing..

objects.name: pine coffin
objects.description: A long pine coffin rests against one wall.

extra_descriptions.description:
Tattered black felt lines the inside of the coffin.  Dark splotches of dried
blood harden the felt in places.  Strips of felt, obviously rent by sharp 
claws, hang loosely revealing the bare pine underneath.

objects.name: darkness
objects.description: Darkness pervades the cavern, seeming to feed off the light.

extra_descriptions.description:
The darkness seems almost tangible.  As you concentrate on it, it seems
to pull you towards it..

objects.name: white bone altar
objects.description: A white altar stands here, gleaming brightly.

extra_descriptions.description:
Upon closer examination, you notice that the altar is made of a smooth, 
slightly off white substance similar to bone..

objects.name: bloody black obsidian altar
objects.description: A bloody black altar stands here.

extra_descriptions.description:
Streamers of wet blood spatter the obsidian altar.  The blood seems to
blend in with the black stone, giving it the appearance of some twisted
form of red-streaked marble.

objects.name: gleaming white throne
objects.description: A gleaming white throne rests in the center of the room.

extra_descriptions.description:
It appears to be made of some weird glowing substance.. strangely like
polished bone.

objects.name: forbidding dark black throne
objects.description: A dark throne looms here, glowing with an eerie inner light.

extra_descriptions.description:
The throne seems to be made of a polished black substance similar to
blackened bone.

objects.name: white oak tree
objects.description: An ancient white oak tree towers over the eastern edge of the clearing.

extra_descriptions.description:
A huge white oak looms here.  As you gaze at it, a rectangular area in this
face of the tree -- about the height of a man -- shimmers momentarily, as
if not entirely there.

objects.name: black oak tree
objects.description: An ancient black oak tree towers over the western edge of the clearing.

extra_descriptions.description:
A large gap opens into the base of the black oak, slightly charred as if
burned by fire.

objects.name: signpost sign post
objects.description: Painted wooden arrows have been nailed into the semblance on a signpost.

extra_descriptions.description:
The painted arrows are skewed in all directions, as if the maker couldn't
decide which way they should point and made arrows in all directions just
to be safe.  Which makes it pretty useless as a signpost.. but it looks
like a mighty comfy bench anyway :)

objects.name: leather couch
objects.description: A long leather couch rests here, waiting for a patient to examine.

extra_descriptions.description:
The couch seems to hum continuously.  Under your scrutiny, you think you
hear it mutter something about "..neuro deficiency leading to..", but
maybe it's just your imagination..  Need a seat?

objects.name: neon green throne
objects.description: A gaudy neon green throne rests here, clashing with everything in the room.

objects.name: parrot perch
objects.description: A wooden parrot perch mounted on a thick steel base stands here.

objects.name: tassled jester hat
objects.description: A colorful pointed hat tipped with silver tassles lies here.

objects.name: circlets wonder arm bands
objects.description: A pair of multicolored arm bands lie here.

extra_descriptions.description:
shimmering letters are visible amidst the swirling matter of the circlets:

  in this web of silver wires
  thinner than thread
  and brighter than steel
  we wander --
  dazzled by myriad glints,
  pulsing with knowledge
  and glowing with power...
  And in that glow,

  we know
  and yet are decieved

  we thrive
  and yet we drown

  we grow
  and we are dwarfed

  we are alone
  and never lonely

  we are lost
  and we are found.

objects.name: bubbling indigo potion
objects.description: A deep indigo potion bubbles here.

objects.name: moonbeam moon beam shaft moonlight light
objects.description: A shaft of moonlight glimmers here.

objects.name: innocent dreams
objects.description: Some innocent dreams hover here.

objects.name: gleaming white cross
objects.description: A white cross is here, glowing with an inner light.

objects.name: white kid gloves
objects.short_description: a pair of white kid gloves
objects.description: A pair of white kid gloves lie here.

objects.name: mark gabrian white insignia hair
objects.description: An insignia woven of white panther hair lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
an inscription is woven in gold around edge of the mark:

  Take my hand
  and fear no longer
  Take my hand
  and cry no more..

  Reaching into the icy darkness
  and for an instant
  a glimmer of laughter
  emerges from the depths of memory
  to brush his heart,
  before flickering away,
  leaving traces
  like threads of gold
  shimmering warmly in the darkness.

  Picking up the threads,
  he weaves them together --
  Together my friends.
  Forever my friends.

  And against the deepening darkness
  Echoing in my ears,
  The golden roar of a lion.

objects.name: ice mask

extra_descriptions.description:
A poem is engraved on the inside of the mask:

  A flurry of icy flakes
  blocking out the searing sun
  and wrapping me
  in their cool, soft embrace

  The cold in my mind
  to freeze the memories
  The ice in my heart
  to chill the pain
  The cool in my eyes
  to freeze the tears
  to ice.

extra_descriptions.description:
silver threads interwoven with the black form the words:

  Chill fingers of icy wind
  through open windows
  in the blackest night..
  brushing across his cheek
  and freezing wet tears
  in a comforting mask of ice;

  Take my hand
  and fear no longer
  Take my hand
  and cry no more..

extra_descriptions.description:
It appears to lead absolutely nowhere..
Engraved in the face of the door are the words:

            Zeinia International

extra_descriptions.description:
The bodyparts, hanging in shreds on the walls, are barely recognizable
as humanoid.  Scrawled in blood above the gory artwork are the words:

            "sh'keva Zdreni ke'zeraika shai !"

A chill creeps up the back of your neck.

objects.name: dark crimson armbands arm bands pair
objects.description: A pair of dark crimson armbands gleam like circles of wet blood in the light.

extra_descriptions.keyword: dark crimson armbands arm bands pair circles blood
extra_descriptions.description:
Engraved in the blood red metal is the inscription:  "Ir'vekire zai'Zdreni",
above an engraving of a stooping hawk over two crossed daggers.

objects.description: A band of adamantite set with a blood red ruby hums with promised vengeance.

extra_descriptions.description:
An inscription encircles the outside of the band:  "Ir'vekire zai'Zdreni"

Engraved along the inside of the band, you notice the words:

               "sh'keva Zdreni zeraika shai !"

        ("vengeance for the blood of zdreni is ours !")

The ruby is carved with the form of a stooping hawk over two crossed daggers.

An engraving of two crossed daggers shimmers above the left shoulder of
the chainmail.

magic does not resonate with its wearer, the wearer is automatically
marked as an intruder and subject to attack.
